subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Helio Castroneves, a two-time Indy winner, knocked Dario Franchitti off the top spot in the final five minutes of the first of four days of time trials.
snippet: Helio Castroneves, a two-time Indy winner, knocked Dario Franchitti off the top spot in the final five minutes of the first of four days of time trials.
